description:
It`s Girls` Day, and Keroro has a great idea to liven things up!  This doesn`t bode well.  Then Natsumi gets a ticket from Kululu to see her favorite singer perform live.  Unfortunately, he turns out to be an alien imitator...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: April soutient la fête des jeunes filles / Dance-man en concert
Natsumi Hinamatsuri o Mamore de Arimasu / Keroro Afro de Myaon de Arimasu
夏美 ひなまつりを守れ であります / ケロロ アフロでみゃおん であります
